title: Bone fragments

properties.name: description
properties.value: Bone fragments are items used to charge an imbued skull sceptre, obtainable by using a chisel on any component of a regular skull sceptre.

content:
This article is about the item used to charge the skull sceptre (i). For the quest item, see Bone shard.
Bone fragments
Released18 November 2020 (Update)

Advanced data
Item ID25139

Bone fragments are items used to charge an imbued skull sceptre, obtainable by using a chisel on any component of a regular skull sceptre.

Each fragment is worth one charge, and the amount of fragments obtained from a component depend on how much of the Varrock Diary the player has completed. Any combined sceptre pieces will get the player the fragments equal to the sum of their parts.

Item Default Diary
Easy Medium Hard Elite
Skull sceptre 10 14 18 22 26
Left skull half 5 6 7 8 9
Bottom of sceptre 3 4 5 6 7
Top of sceptre 3 4 5 6 7
Right skull half 3 4 5 6 7
Strange skull 8 10 12 14 16
Runed sceptre 6 8 10 12 14

Obtaining bone fragments[edit | edit source]

The most efficient method to obtain bone fragments is to kill the level 12 minotaurs found on the first sublevel of the Stronghold of Security, as they have the lowest Hitpoints and therefore can be killed the fastest. A different method is to kill the Flesh Crawlers found on the second sublevel, as they are always aggressive to the player, regardless of their combat level. Together with them only having 25 Hitpoints, this makes for a low-intensity way of getting sceptre pieces.

'''Bone fragments''' are items used to charge an [[Skull sceptre (i)|imbued skull sceptre]], obtainable by using a [[chisel]] on any component of a regular [[skull sceptre]].

Each fragment is worth one charge, and the amount of fragments obtained from a component depend on how much of the [[Varrock Diary]] the player has completed. Any combined sceptre pieces will get the player the fragments equal to the sum of their parts.

==Obtaining bone fragments==
The most efficient method to obtain bone fragments is to kill the level 12 [[Minotaur|minotaurs]] found on the first sublevel of the [[Stronghold of Security]], as they have the lowest [[Hitpoints]] and therefore can be killed the fastest. A different method is to kill the [[Flesh Crawler]]s found on the second sublevel, as they are always aggressive to the player, regardless of their combat level. Together with them only having 25 Hitpoints, this makes for a low-intensity way of getting sceptre pieces.
